scripts.db:migrate: rm -rf prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate reset -f && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.extract:places: rm -f src/extract/extractPlaces.js && tsc src/extract/extractPlaces.ts && node src/extract/extractPlaces.js
scripts.process: rm -f src/process/index.js && tsc src/process/index.ts && node src/process/index.js
